channel.title: Posts on Xinyi Shen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Xinyi Shen

item.title: Arxiv Daily | Dec 2020
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2020 年 12 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 21 Dec 20 – 22 Dec 20 更新于 23 Dec 2020 A Distributional Approach to Controlled Text Generation Author: Muhammad Khalifa, Hady Elsahar, Marc Dymetman Comments: Under review at ICLR 2021 ​ Recognizing Emotion Cause in Conversations Author: Soujanya Poria, Navonil Majumder, Devamanyu Hazarika, Deepanway Ghosal, Rishabh Bhardwaj, Samson Yu Bai Jian, Romila Ghosh, Niyati Chhaya, Alexander Gelbukh, Rada Mihalcea ‘We introduce the task of recognizing emotion cause in conversations with an accompanying dataset named RECCON.

item.title: Arxiv Daily | Nov 2020
item.description: 这篇博客记录的是 2020 年 11 月内刷到的 Arxiv cs.CL 感兴趣的文献。 27 Nov 20 – 30 Nov 20 更新于 2 Dec 2020 Latent Template Induction with Gumbel-CRFs Author: Yao Fu, Chuanqi Tan, Bin Bi, Mosha Chen, Yansong Feng, Alexander M. Rush Comments: NeurIPS 2020 ​ Generative Pre-training for Paraphrase Generation by Representing and Predicting Spans in Exemplars Author: Tien-Cuong Bui, Van-Duc Le, Hai-Thien To, Sang Kyun Cha Comments: IEEE International Conference on Big Data and Smart Computing 2021 Keywords: masking, predicting ​
